jd_information.description: Ensure proper selling techniques and strategies are utilized to maximize room revenues. Coordinate all duties and responsibilities of the reservation department ensuring a high level of accuracy and efficiency. Any matter which may effect the interests of the hotel should be brought to the attention of the Management. Plan & prepare forecasts on a timely basis for review. Plan & prepare monthly reports, forecasts and other relevant reports. Ensure that the various monthly statistical reports are generated and assist in the development of occupancy forecasts for the annual budget.
